data.eml:eml: A new species and additional records of Lobrathium Mulsant & Rey (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Paederinae) from South China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Zhong, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2016): A new species and additional records of Lobrathium Mulsant & Rey (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Paederinae) from South China. ZooKeys 568: 51-58, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.568.7622, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.568.7622
